bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Device Discovery, Connection Management, and Control Protocol for IEEE 1722(TM) Based Devices
IEEE Standard for Device Discovery, Connection Management, and Control Protocol for IEEE 1722(TM) Based Devices

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard specifies the protocol, device discovery, connection management and device control procedures used to facilitate interoperability between audio and video based End Stations that use IEEE 1722 based Streams on IEEE 802(R) based networks.

This standard specifies the protocol, device discovery, connection management and device control procedures used to facilitate interoperability between audio and video based End Stations that use IEEE 1722 based Streams on IEEE 802(R) based networks.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
